title: The Deceitful Dish
description: It’s time to clear the docket! Monte Belmonte and Joel Mann are back again to squeeze in one last summertime fun time! Disputes about oyster sauce, The Lion King, when to sing "Happy Birthday," and a sound in a song from the musical Hamilton. Plus much more!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
